  proposition: Katherine Tian et al. proposed strategies for eliciting calibrated confidence scores from language models fine-tuned with human feedback in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:

  proposition: Elias Stengel-Eskin, Peter Hase, and Mohit Bansal developed LACIE for calibration in large language models at the 2023 Neural Information Processing Systems conference.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Elias Stengel-Eskin|DEVELOPED|LACIE
    Peter Hase|DEVELOPED|LACIE
